message: I have a unique and valuable product that I think you'll really like. Would you like to make an offer on it?
Thanks for showing me the product, Alice. I'm interested, but $12,000 is a bit high for my budget. Would you consider $9,000?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we discuss a price of $11,000?
I appreciate you coming down, Alice.  I can do $10,000, but that's as high as I can go.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can do $11,500, but I really think the product is worth more than that. Can you meet me in the middle?
Alice, I understand it's valuable to you, but I'm on a tight budget.  I can offer $10,250, but that's absolutely my limit.
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle, Bob. I can do $11,000, but I think I need to get closer to my target price. Can you really only offer $10,250?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $10,500 is the best I can do.  I think that's a fair price, and I'm ready to close the deal if you are.
I'm starting to get a bit worried that we won't reach a deal, Bob. I can do $11,500, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. This is my final offer, so I hope we can meet in the middle

Alice, you know I'm serious about buying this product, and I've been fair in my offers. I'm willing to go up to $10,750, but that's absolutely my limit.  It's a good deal for both of us, and I'd hate to see this fall apart now.
